entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 6:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
